title: Gi(a)rlish Number - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Female Protagonist   Voice Actors
author: Watari Wataru   渡航
description: College student Chitose Karasuma is determined not to do boring things as she enters the adult world. To this end, this bad-mannered beauty barges into a facility that trains would-be voice actors and actresses, somehow landing a job at 'Number One Produce,' a voice actress agency managed by her older brother, Gojou. In Chitose's mind, she's poised for greatness, but finds herself at a loss when she continues to only get minor roles. As she clashes with other girls in the agency, including a cunning airhead and a girl with a Kansai accent, Chitose is about to learn that there's more to succeeding in this competitive industry than she imagined.>
